reviewText: I decided to order this DVD set because my husband and I are going on a cruise to that  part of the world next year and I wanted to get a sense of what the culture is like before we go. This DVD set certainly did that - and the folliage is so beautiful I can't wait to see it in person. I was surprised by how many films are on this set, and I certainly got more than I expected from t his purchase. It is also great to have learnd how much America helped these poor people over the years.
